verses.verse: They brought <S%H935><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and set <S%H3322><s%> it in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had pitched <S%H5186><s%> for it: <S%H7126><s%> and they offered burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

When David <S%H1732><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of offering <S%H5927><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> he blessed <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

He dealt <S%H2505><s%> to everyone <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> both man <S%H376><s%> and woman, <S%H802><s%> to every one <S%H376><s%> a loaf <S%H3603><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and a portion of meat, <S%H829><s%> and a cake of raisins. <S%H809><s%>

He appointed <S%H5414><s%> certain of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and to celebrate <S%H2142><s%> and to thank <S%H3034><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

Asaph <S%H623><s%> the chief, <S%H7218><s%> and second <S%H4932><s%> to him Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> Jeiel, <S%H3273><s%> and Shemiramoth, <S%H8070><s%> and Jehiel, <S%H3171><s%> and Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> and Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> and Obed-Edom, <S%H5654><s%> and Jeiel, <S%H3273><s%> with stringed instruments <S%H5035><s%> and with harps; <S%H3658><s%> and Asaph <S%H623><s%> with cymbals, <S%H4700><s%> sounding aloud; <S%H8085><s%>

and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> and Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> with trumpets <S%H2689><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

Then on that day <S%H3117><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> first <S%H7218><s%> ordained <S%H5414><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his brothers. <S%H251><s%>
Oh give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Call <S%H7121><s%> on his name. <S%H8034><s%> Make his doings <S%H5949><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> among the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to him. <S%H2167><s%> Sing praises to him. <S%H7878><s%> Tell of all his marvelous works. <S%H6381><s%>
Glory <S%H1984><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%> Let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>
Seek <S%H1875><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and his strength. <S%H5797><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> forever more. <S%H8548><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvelous <S%H6381><s%> works that he has done, <S%H6213><s%> his wonders, <S%H4159><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of his mouth, <S%H6310><s%>
you seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> you children <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> his chosen ones. <S%H972><s%>
He is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%> His judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations, <S%H1755><s%>
the covenant which he made <S%H3772><s%> with Abraham, <S%H85><s%> his oath <S%H7621><s%> to Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>
He confirmed <S%H5975><s%> the same to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a statute, <S%H2706><s%> and to Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%>
saying, <S%H559><s%> "I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> The lot <S%H2256><s%> of your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%>"
when you were but a few <S%H4557><s%> men in number, <S%H4592><s%> yes, very few, and foreigners were in it. <S%H1481><s%>
They went <S%H1980><s%> about from nation <S%H1471><s%> to nation, <S%H1471><s%> from one kingdom <S%H4467><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>
He allowed <S%H3240><s%> no man <S%H376><s%> to do them wrong. <S%H6231><s%> Yes, <S%H3198><s%> he reproved kings for their sakes, <S%H4428><s%>
"Don't <S%H5060><s%> touch my anointed <S%H4899><s%> ones! <S%H5030><s%> Do my prophets no harm! <S%H7489><s%>"
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all the earth! <S%H776><s%> Display <S%H1319><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day. <S%H3117><s%>
Declare <S%H5608><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and his marvelous works <S%H6381><s%> among all the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
For great <S%H1419><s%> is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised. <S%H1984><s%> He also is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> above all gods. <S%H430><s%>
For all the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are idols, <S%H457><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
Honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1935><s%> are before him. <S%H6440><s%> Strength <S%H5797><s%> and gladness <S%H2304><s%> are in his place. <S%H4725><s%>
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you relatives <S%H4940><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength! <S%H5797><s%>

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due to his name. <S%H8034><s%> Bring <S%H5375><s%> an offering, <S%H4503><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him. <S%H7812><s%> Worship Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array. <S%H1927><s%>
Tremble <S%H2342><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H776><s%> all the earth. The world <S%H8398><s%> also is established <S%H3559><s%> that it can't <S%H4131><s%> be moved.

Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be glad, <S%H8055><s%> and let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice! <S%H1523><s%> Let them say <S%H559><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> reigns! <S%H4427><s%>"
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar, <S%H7481><s%> and its fullness! <S%H4393><s%> Let the field <S%H7704><s%> exult, <S%H5970><s%> and all that is therein!

Then the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> will sing for joy <S%H7442><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he comes <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Oh give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he is good, <S%H2896><s%> for his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Say, <S%H559><s%> "Save <S%H3467><s%> us, <S%H430><s%> God of our salvation! <S%H3468><s%> Gather us together <S%H6908><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> us from the nations, <S%H1471><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to your holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> to triumph <S%H7623><s%> in your praise. <S%H8416><s%>"

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> even to everlasting. <S%H5769><s%> All the people <S%H5971><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Amen, <S%H543><s%>" and praised <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

So he left <S%H5800><s%> there, <S%H6440><s%> before the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his brothers, <S%H251><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> as every day <S%H3117><s%>'s work <S%H1697><s%> required; <S%H3117><s%>

and Obed-Edom <S%H5654><s%> with their brothers, <S%H251><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> - eight; <S%H8083><s%> Obed-Edom <S%H5654><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> and Hosah <S%H2621><s%> to be doorkeepers; <S%H7778><s%>

and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and his brothers <S%H251><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the high place <S%H1116><s%> that was at Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%>

to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> and evening, <S%H6153><s%> even according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> to Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

and with them Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and the rest <S%H7605><s%> who were chosen, <S%H1305><s%> who were mentioned <S%H5344><s%> by name, <S%H8034><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> because his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> endures forever; <S%H5769><s%>

and with them Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> with trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> for those that should sound <S%H8085><s%> aloud, <S%H3627><s%> and with instruments for the songs <S%H7892><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> to be at the gate. <S%H8179><s%>
All the people <S%H5971><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his house: <S%H1004><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> returned <S%H5437><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> his house. <S%H1004><s%>
